title: Refund icon?
body:
Well I bought the Arcade Ahri  Icon and I regret buying and I know I can't refund it but is there any way you can?
Like creating a ticket or something?

replies.body: We can't issue refunds through the boards. Anytime you have items you'd like refunded, you should be able to use your refund tokens if you still have left. Outside of those you're always welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Why do you regret getting it?
